title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Todd previews stories coming up on today's show. Todd talks to James Golden, aka Bo Snerdley, about the world premiere of his new podcast: Rush Limbaugh: The Man Behind the Golden EIB Microphone. A clip from Episode One, "Most Difficult Day," in which James talks about the day we learned of Rush's cancer diagnosis. James on the first time he heard Rush and the meteoric rise and growth of Rush's show. A clip from a future podcast episode with Rush's brother David Limbaugh. James on Rush's talent on loan from God. Iran behind attacks on Israel, using missiles Barack Obama paid for. Who's really running Biden. Who's really president? Imagine the reaction if all this was going on with Trump as president. Fauci denies NIH funded Wuhan lab.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Fauci vs. Rand Paul. Rush on the first time Rand Paul took on Fauci. Liz Cheney voted out of GOP House leadership, rips Trump. Rush understood how the outsider Trump panicked swamp-types like Liz Cheney. Rush on the Democrat Party relationship with the teachers union: It has nothing to do with teachers or students, just political power and money. Callers weigh in on Biden, Cheney. Rush on gas prices in 2009 sounds like it could be today.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Joe Biden's inflation, gas prices. Trump statement on windmills. McCarthy, McConnell, Lee on Biden's energy policy. Rush warned everyone about the coming Biden energy crisis. Border out of control, migrant babies found in the dirt. Solar panel salesman calls. Rush: Everything is politics. Left targets NRA as Antifa, BLM threat rise. EIB High Note: Homeless Nigerian Boy Becomes American Chess Champion. Todd on getting the call to be a guest host for Rush.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
